Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:期

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+671F

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 朞

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:期

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+671F

Main pronunciation 主要发音: qī

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning time period.

English senses 英语理解: period of time; date; time limit

Usage example 用法举例: 期待 qī dài (expect)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 302

Shuowen 说文解字: 會也從月其聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 期 flip-variant 朞 from moon 月 yuè and phonetic basket 其 qí C250 期<朞> simp 期.

朞字的基本解释

朞
jī
同“期2”。

朞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》渠之切，平之，羣。］
(1)会；会合。
(2)邀约；约定。
(3)希望；企求。
(4)预知；料想。
(5)机运；际会。
(6)限，限度。
(7)必，必定。
(8)期限。
(9)百岁曰期。亦泛指老，高寿。
(10)预定的时间；选定的日子。
(11)指一段时间。
(12)待；看待。
(13)相当；相合。
(14)常。
(15)见“期期”。
(16)地质学上小于“世”的地质时代单位。
(17)量词。用于分期的事物。
(18)通“綦”。极。
(19)通“旗”。
(20)通“惎”。教。
(21)通“夔”。参见“期牛”。
(22)姓。参见“期思”。
[②]［jī］
［《廣韻》居之切，平之，見。］
“朞1”的繁体字。亦作“朞1”。“稘1”的古字。
(1)时间周而复始。分别指一周年，一个月或一整天。
(2)“期服”的省称。
(3)通“其”。句末语气助词。表疑问。

朞字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【月字部】　朞； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页506第07
〔古文〕???【廣韻】【集韻】?居之切，音姬。稘，或作朞。復其時也。【書·堯典】朞三百有六旬有六日。【傳】四時曰朞。【疏】匝時而朞，朞卽匝也。【集韻】亦作期。

Basic explanation of words
period
jī
Same as "period 2".
period
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" Qu Zhiqi, Ping Zhi, Qun. ]
(1) Meeting; meeting.
(2) Invitation; agreement.
(3) Hope; desire.
(4) Foresight; anticipation.
(5) Opportunity; chance.
(6) Limit, limit.
(7) Yes, definitely.
(8) Time limit.
(9) The hundred-year-old date. It also refers to old age and longevity.
(10) Scheduled time; selected day.
(11) Refers to a period of time.
(12) To be; to be treated.
(13) Equivalent; consistent.
(14) Often.
(15) See "Period".
(16) Geological age unit smaller than "world" in geology.
(17) Quantifiers. Things used for staging.
(18) Link "Qi". pole.
(19) Through the "flag".
(20) Through "brought". teach.
(21) Link "Kui". See "period cattle".
(22) Last name. See "Expectation".
[②]［jī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat, see. ]
Traditional characters for "期1". Also known as "period 1". The ancient word "稘1".
(1) Time goes round and round. Refers to the first anniversary, a month or a whole day respectively.
(2) The provincial name of "period service".
(3) Link "其". Modal particles at the end of a sentence. Table question.
period
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Yue Zi Department] 　 period; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 506 page 07
[Ancient text]??? [Guangyun] [Jiyun] The cut of residence, Yinji.稘, or work date. At the same time. 【Book·Yaodian】Three hundred and sixty days and six days. [Biography] Four o'clock refers to the period. 【Sparse】Turn around from time to time, but also in time. [Ji Yun] also for the period.
